title: A Glass Half Full
description: The British multimillionaire and publishing mogul brings together 187 of his sly and irreverent poems, in which he explores such topics as sex, ecology, the Third Reich, old dogs, whales, and the Crusades in his trademark, unorthodox style, accompanied by an audio CD of the author reading from his work. Original. 25,000 first printing.
author: Felix Dennis
